title.rendered: How Will Data NFTs Shape the Evolution of Collaborative ML?

content.rendered:
It’s clear that Machine Learning and AI is in the process of revolutionizing our modern world, but how proprietary data sets will evolve to meet these changes remains to be seen.

At GNY we are excited by the structural capacities that blockchain technology can bring to this evolution, specifically the innovations surrounding transparency and auditability of data that Data NFTs can bring. Read more about it on our Medium blog.

Data NFTs: How Tokenising Data Will Revolutionise Blockchain >>
